oai_dc:dc.dc:title: MOKE spectroscopy of sputter deposited Cu-ferrite films
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: VEIS, M
KOLINSKY, V
VISNOVSKY, S
KULKARNI, PD
DESAI, M
VENKATARAMANI, N
PRASAD, S
KRISHNAN, R
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: magneto-optical effects
thin films
cation distribution in ferrites
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This work is devoted to the study of the effect of deposition conditions and post-deposition treatment in Cu-ferrite films using magneto-optic Kerr effect at both polar and longitudinal configurations between 2 and 5 eV. In the sample annealed at 850 degrees C the amplitudes are comparable with those observed in bulk ferrite crystals whereas as-deposited films showed reduced amplitudes and smeared out structure. (C) 2004
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: JOURNAL OF MAGNETISM AND MAGNETIC MATERIALS, 272(), E885-E886
